Posts.Content: Yes darling I feel so crap Iook strange sort of haunted I have put in 2 stone since may feel reality like I am living someone's else's life  bit lucky to be alive.  Does this make senseive Karen xx
Posts.Title: Angry !

Posts.Content: Morning all just got on the scales another 3ibs I have put on this week coupled with my red raw boob with a blue background ( had 9 rads 11 to go) I look simply adorable this morning.!!! Have a good day ladies and George  Karen xxx
Posts.Title: Angry !

Posts.Content: 3 just think by Christmas you will be back to normal
Posts.Title: Angry !

Posts.Content: Here here Sidney xx
Posts.Title: Angry !

Posts.Content: That's a good idea grog I I have to share this I have just come home from my 16th radio very tired now driving myself there on my own which isn't a problem for me my friend just phoned to tell me about her weekend  then asked how are you ?? I said tired she said at least you finish next week some people have to do a 3 hour journey every day to get to work and back ???? What ?? Excuse me ?? Really my god I had to get off the phone or I would have fallen out with her. Am I going nuts !!
Posts.Title: Angry !

Posts.Content: Hi Amanda I am on my 9th rads bearing up ok but so tired and my bones ache walk like a wooden top in the morning but I think it's more down to the letozole than the rads have you started your hormone therapy yet or are you triple negative ? wishing you a peaceful sleep love Karen
Posts.Title: Achy joints during radiotherapy

Posts.Content: Dear Julia thank you for your message they took all my nodes out when they found the seminal node positive I spoke to a nurse at cancer research and she did a prognosis test put in my details 51 grade 2 1/19 nodes oestgon progestrone positive her neg it came out only 1.5 per cent better off with chemo for cancer to come back just really mixed up got my wig and got help with the kids while I have chemo  but with those odds maybe I should go for radio and letrozole?? Love Karen xx
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy with W L E with one node positive

Posts.Content: Dear lakes lover we never know but you are right we canto e life in fear and I think I will make the same choice as you on Tuesday thank you for your experience srenght and hopeove Karen x
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy with W L E with one node positive

Posts.Content: Dear Julia thank you so very much it does make sense what you are saying it does feel like a life and death thing but you right I can only imagine how terrible chemo is I would worry about having a stroke all the time will have to google neutropenic sepsis ? shame you live so far away or I would say lets go and have a glass of wine!xx
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy with W L E with one node positive

Posts.Content: Sorry spelling mistakes on whole new level tonight xx
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy with W L E with one node positive

Posts.Content: Hi to you all I have to make my final decision on Tuesday weather to have chemo or just have radio I had one node affected everyone been so kind as spoke about my fear of chemo having had stroke has any just had rads with one node with full ax clearance sorry I am driving myself crazy with this felt so emotional at coffee morning came home feel really alone today sorry if this sounds pathetic love Karen xx
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy with W L E with one node positive

Posts.Content: Sorry I forget to say the nurse said yesterday following NICE guidelines soon as lymph nodes are involved they have to offer chemo thank you xxxx
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy with W L E with one node positive

Posts.Content: Dear G an j you and Julia always on the same page thank you for your ongoing invaluable advise you have helped me from day one you make me laugh everyday (even today ) when I have been an emotional wreck xxg
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy with W L E with one node positive

Posts.Content: Dear suzie thank you it's difficult but you and the lovely people on this forum make me feel better to make the right desion and stick with it with no regrets thank you it's now 8 weeks since my surgery just want to get started on the next thing, hope you are ok enjoy your weekend love Karen x
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy with W L E with one node positive

Posts.Content: Bless you sweetheart and to you and everyone have a lovely weekend and thank you so much for the advise love Karen xx
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy with W L E with one node positive

Posts.Content: Dear pearl drops thank you for your lovely message it brought a tear to my eye you are right just make my desion and enjoy everyday with my children all I do is think about cancer I think I will feel better in my head once I start treatment thank you again for your uplifting message love Karen x
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy with W L E with one node positive

Posts.Content: Hi Lynda use biosen or Dr organic both work well and are safe to use love Karen x
Posts.Title: Massage & exercise

Posts.Content: Hi silk painter I had the same as you they drained my seroma 5 times then it got infected then I went on antibiotics it seemed to clear up the swelling but it's still sore and lumpy now ask surgeon on Monday to be reffered to physio who is experienced with breast cancer ladies and lymph mine was really good I was told by B c n not to use massenger because it could be to harsh good luck for Monday love Karen x
Posts.Title: Massage & exercise

Posts.Content: Hi Lynda I know it sounds silly but make sure you use simple shower gel and auimumn free deodorant because the normal stuff can start of infection again love Karen x
Posts.Title: Massage & exercise

Posts.Content: Hi Julia thank you for quick reply by the way my b c n was talking before I had the scans she thought  having chemo was a given now it's says on my treatment plain radio harmone therapy and to did us chemo nobody has mentioned vasular  invasion  thank you for the advise about the test. Love karen
Posts.Title: Meeting with oncology

Posts.Content: Hi ladies and George I think after all they are going to put the ball in my court because I think I am borderline chemo? Had W L E with SN b the sentinel node was positive so hence ancillary clearance 1/19 nodes involved 30mm in size grade  2 with associated Dcis margins clear Er/.p r positive  hr2 negative can anyone explain this is me please thank you love karen xx
Posts.Title: Meeting with oncology

Posts.Content: hi lovely a sorry George davina came in the site she seems very interested now I have finished treatment I have been feeling very up and down since I finished last week still can't belief I drive to London everyday I was badly burned after the booster sessions my skin is still red raw but I also feel blessed to be here with my children going to enjoy each day it's amazes me how much cancer changes you as a person George thanks for being so sweet to davina speak soon sleep well my lovelies xxxcxcc
Posts.Title: Sorry and thank you

Posts.Content: Hi sweetheart reading your post I would encourage you to speak to a counsellor and may get at least a few sessions of CBT you have had a massive shock I am a counsellor have been for 16 years but when it's your own pain and jorney will handle things different don't let your experience as a cancer nurse lie you to over aniiaize things let yourself try to enjoy each day we don't really know what tommorow brings having cancer or not.  I have taken a year off because I dint want to project my issues on my clients so I am going to spend this time grieving for my old self but embrasding the new strong but different woman who takes no crap from anyone and lives a honest clean heathy life please keep in touch and feel free to pm me I hate to think of you feeling this way believe me I first have to be like this the forum and the wonderful people on here will carry you over Karen xxxx
Posts.Title: Feeling Morbid

Posts.Content: hi lovely ladies yesterday I was all ready to start my Radiotheapy having 20 sessions over 4 weeks started taking letizole about 6 weeks ago then went to see ong who found a lump under my arm( it had been so swollen after allxillrsy clearance I couldn't feel it. Now she says I can't start radio until she knows what we are dealing with I am so scared again been 11 weeks since surgery with no treatment except hormone the lump is big and can feel it though my top I am thinking how can this be secondary After less than 3 months it must be scare tissue what do you think   Thank you love Karen xxx
Posts.Title: Scared again

Posts.Content: Oh lerain it's a horrible roller costar wishing you all the love and luck tomorrow to start your radio may I ask you how did they discover your mole ? Love Karen xxx
Posts.Title: Scared again

Posts.Content: Thanks Julia.i am having the scan next Thursday its a long time to wait when you are worried so you know I will just wait and enjoy the children's half term hope you enjoy it with your daughters love Karen xxxx
Posts.Title: Scared again

Posts.Content: Thank you jj would really like to pm you I have had sorems drained 5 times under my arm and the lump is under my scar but the way my ong acted I feel scared and back to the horrible place after diagnosis in July thank you for replying how are you ? I read your posts you ate amazing how you ate doing with your chemo but still post for others in distress thank you jjove Karen xxx
Posts.Title: Scared again

Posts.Content: Dear lerain how did you get on today would be great to hear love Karen xx
Posts.Title: Scared again

Posts.Content: I have got a mole that has changed shape gosh I think I am looking loosing the plot tonight 2 days ago I was ok and looking forward to getting on with my treatment will say a prayer for you tonight sweetheart please let me know how you get on xxx
Posts.Title: Scared again

Posts.Content: Hi I am sorry to hear you have been treated to bad when you have been though so much I have had my sermons aspirated four times my surgeon did it last time he said Karen you are healing so well besides this problem so said he didn't really want to do it again but got me appointment with specialist phiso I still have a golf ball under my arm but it is not so painful.  Honestly Hun if its really hurting you tell them to maybe take 100ml out to relieve it a bit.  This is all new to me but hope this helps a bit love Karen x
Posts.Title: Seromas and the risk of infection

Posts.Content: Sorry forgot to say I had the same as you w l e and full clearance  3weeks ago and mine was ok for the first week Karen x
Posts.Title: Seromas and the risk of infection

Posts.Content: Hi G you are so funny you really cheer me up love karen
Posts.Title: Eyebrows

Posts.Content: Hi susie just out of hospital had lumpectomy and was toild that's my luph nodes were full of cancer cells so they removed them I was told I will need chemo ,I have been told it may have spread  have meeting on the 20th to sort out chemo and while body scans. Hope we can support each other love karen
Posts.Title: *** August Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: Hi all feel really down and scared they said they had to remove all nodes because they ared full of cancer cells  go back on the 20th to find out when I have full body scans and chemo has anyone got any help for me tonight my friend is with me but seems to be so detached I feel so lonely I am a single mum with two kids would love to hear from anyone tonight for a bit of support all the best to everyone love karen
Posts.Title: Removed lump and had axeually clearance on Friday

Posts.Content: Well done sweetheart thanks you your re ply to my post thank you my first your last I think we will never be the same pre cancer maybe more strong but with more empathy for others aware of how precious ice is and how quick it can be taken away love Karen xxxxps I am not sure about the swimming but I can't wait to get back to a form of exercise xxxx
Posts.Title: Finished Radiotherapy !

Posts.Content: Oh that's great to hear my boy is 9 and is my rock my teenage daughter is very angry and doesn't know where to go with it have told both there schools and hopefully they will be supportive I know a few mums and they said just ask if you need anything ,can I ask is the chemo every two weeks? Love karen
Posts.Title: Young children

Posts.Content: Hi my son is amazing he is 9  but my daughter has always been hard work I am a planner it's hard to be a wait and see person for me but I am learning to keep it in the day or else I would drive myself crazy.  I have told the head teachers at both of there schools so they can understand and support the children my daughter is not able to get on the bus so I will have to drive her and ask for help the days when I need it .do you know how often we have chemo ? Love karen
Posts.Title: Young children

Posts.Content: Hi Sarah thanks for your reply you seem a very positive lady. I think I will cut my hair before I start chemo it's long and I think it would freak me out if I found it on the pillow when I woke up  did you buy a wig ? If so where do you buy it ? who many chemo sessions did you have?     Sorry about all the questions love karen
Posts.Title: Young children

Posts.Content: So we are in the same position my daughter has special education needs and ADHD  she is 13 and going in to year 9 she is not dealing with it  seems we will starting chemo about the same time  hope we can support each other how old are your other children.? My son is 9 and he is my rock  love karen
Posts.Title: Young children

Posts.Content: Hi just wondered if anyone I has been recently diagnosed  with young children  just had lumpectomy and full clearance ,bone scan and ct scan been told got all the lump with clear margins which is great awaiting oc appointment to work out a plain just want to stay alive and ok for my kids It's the waiting that does me they go back to school next week not sure when I start chemo so mixed emotions at the moment
Posts.Title: Young children

Posts.Content: Hi me again can you explain to me how your pre chemo meeting was please I have mine on the 15th September thank you love Karen xx
Posts.Title: Still in discomfort

Posts.Content: Thanks  I always get a boost hearing from you  i have long hair like you had. Should I cut it now and get a wig to get used to it ? What is fect will I have this do you think ? Love Karen xxx ps enjoy tyour hoilday xxx
Posts.Title: Still in discomfort

Posts.Content: Hi Eleanor  I drove for the first time yesterday. Just to the shops  and every bump or pot hole in the road was awful I was just sitting here thinking if I should drive to phiso today?  I have to get back in to ot school run tommorow  how is it going with your middle daughter ?  My girl is very up and down she was was hiipo. Last night but she is sleeping now.  Take care lovely from Karen xxx
Posts.Title: Still in discomfort

Posts.Content: Hi I had mine drained for the third time on Tuesday it just keeps filling up !!! It's all these little things that does my head in !!the waiting for the next meeting or resuits  I had lumpectomy and full clearance 6th August  I also kept it all in but the last week I am like treats tears can't stop crying hope we can support each other love Karen xx
Posts.Title: Seroma and infection.

Posts.Content: Dear Helen saw phiso yesterday no infection or cording she said just keeps filling up I don't understand why thanks Karen xx
Posts.Title: Seroma and infection.

Posts.Content: Hi thanks for your message haven't had meds for it phiso said yesterday not infected but just keeps filling up what exercises or massage do you use on your arm ? Love Karen
